name: Shitmat
description: '''Shitmat''' is an English [[breakcore]] artist and [[Mashup (music)|mashup]] producer, one of several monikers used by Henry Collins. Shitmat became known in the early 2000s for releases on the [[Ad Noiseam]] and [[Planet Mu]] labels. He also set up his own label, Wrong Music and put on parties in [[Brighton]]. His 2012 project Mash Hits remixed every [[Lists of UK Singles Chart number ones|UK number one single]] from 1952 onwards. He then stopped the Shitmat project, restarting it again in 2016.
